subject: fix(ux): comprehensive UX review fixes — accessibility, mobile, data integrity
body:
Fixes 14 issues identified in deep UX review:

1. Stale workspace check: use !activeWorkspace instead of !activeWorkspaceId
   to prevent ghost workspace rendering after deletion
2. Transaction-wrap deleteNode/bulkDeleteNodes for atomic data operations
3. iOS input font-size 16px to prevent auto-zoom on focus
4. Toast notification system (useToast + ToastContainer) replaces window.alert
5. ConfirmDialog replaces window.confirm with themed inline dialog
6. Empty graph state message for workspaces with 0 nodes
7. Focus trapping (useFocusTrap) on all 9 modals for WCAG compliance
8. ARIA roles: context menu (role=menu/menuitem), detail drawer (aria-modal),
   view switcher (role=tablist/tab/aria-selected), all modals (role=dialog)
9. Escape key handler on TutorialModal
10. Mobile bottom sheet: swipe-to-dismiss gesture + body scroll lock
11. Mobile touch targets bumped from 36px to 44px (WCAG 2.5.5)
12. Edge label contrast improved (#6b7280 → #9ca3af for AA compliance)
13. Focus-visible styles added for workspace-card-new-btn, import-paste-toggle,
    detail-drawer-close, export-option-btn, toast-dismiss
14. Property 'contains' filter bug fixed: new property-contains AST node type
    instead of incorrectly falling through to title search
